description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省太原市的一所全日制公办高级中学，是山西省首批重点中学。
description.en: A full-time public high school in Taiyuan, Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China, and one of the first key middle schools in Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 山西省太原市的教育行政主管部门。
description.en: The education administrative department of Taiyuan City, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 太原市第五中学校校长。
description.en: Principal of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，是综合研究拟订经济和社会发展政策，进行总量平衡，指导总体经济体制改革的宏观调控部门。
description.en: A ministerial-level department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for studying and formulating economic and social development policies, maintaining macroeconomic balance, and guiding the overall economic system reform.

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省教育事业。
description.en: A constituent department of the Shanxi Provincial People's Government, responsible for education affairs in the province.

description.zh-cn: 曾任太原市第五中学校校长。
description.en: Former principal of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 曾任太原市第五中学校校长。
description.en: Former principal of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 曾任太原市第五中学校校长。
description.en: Former principal of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，太原市第五中学校杰出校友。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，太原市第五中学校杰出校友。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，党和国家领导人之一，太原市第五中学校杰出校友。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, one of the leaders of the Party and the State, and a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框内容，太原市第五中学校隶属于太原市教育局管辖。
description.en: According to the infobox, Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School is affiliated with the Taiyuan City Education Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 杨向东担任太原市第五中学校的校长。
description.en: Yang Xiangdong serves as the principal of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 国家发改委曝光太原五中在2004年、2005年招生中，以每生3万元的标准，多招收113名“三限生”，共多收费用339万元。
description.en: The National Development and Reform Commission exposed Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School for illicitly collecting 3.39 million yuan by enrolling an extra 113 students at a standard of 30,000 yuan per student in 2004 and 2005.

description.zh-cn: 因乱收费问题，山西省教育厅责成太原五中作出深刻检查。
description.en: Due to the issue of illegal fees, the Shanxi Provincial Department of Education ordered Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School to conduct a thorough self-criticism.

description.zh-cn: 因乱收费问题，太原市教育局责成太原五中作出深刻检查，并派工作组进驻督促指导整改。
description.en: Due to the issue of illegal fees, the Taiyuan City Education Bureau ordered Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School to conduct a thorough self-criticism and dispatched a work group to supervise the rectification.

description.zh-cn: 杨喜高是太原市第五中学校的历届校长之一。
description.en: Yang Xigao was one of the former principals of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 章嘉谦是太原市第五中学校的历届校长之一。
description.en: Zhang Jiaqian was one of the former principals of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 王一瑛是太原市第五中学校的历届校长之一。
description.en: Wang Yiying was one of the former principals of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 高君宇是太原市第五中学校的杰出校友。
description.en: Gao Junyu is a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 贺昌是太原市第五中学校的杰出校友。
description.en: He Chang is a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 彭真是太原市第五中学校的杰出校友。
description.en: Peng Zhen is a distinguished alumnus of Taiyuan No. 5 Middle School.
